article_title: The Newest US Sanctions on China's Huawei Could Backfire
article_description: A reported ban on sales to Huawei of chips made with American equipment might intensify China s drive to develop its own chip industry
article_content: Worsening relations between Washington and Beijing could trigger punishing new US restrictions on Huaweis supply of cutting edge microchips  But some experts believe this would only backfire by pushing China  and other countries  to develop more alternatives    3606 chars
